description: This file defines a helper class NoteIdGen for generating the next note ID based on existing Note objects in-memory, primarily for mock or in-memory contexts. It provides a static method to compute the next available ID by scanning existing notes.

classes.name: NoteIdGen
classes.description: A utility class for generating the next note ID in in-memory or mock contexts.

methods.name: nextId
methods.description: Returns the next available ID by finding the maximum existing ID in the provided list of Note objects and adding one.
